title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.102 - Aisles and working spaces
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.102 - Aisles and working spaces

State Regulations

Unobstructed aisles and working spaces are to be provided of sufficient width to permit employees to perform their duties readily without contamination of food or food-contact surfaces by clothing or personal contact. Easily movable storage equipment, such as pallets, racks and dollies, is to be positioned to provide accessibility to working areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-1.102

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
